name: 2048 A.D.
description:
2048 A.D. offers completely revised and rebuilt experience of an original 2048 puzzle game. It is a very addictive and simple puzzle as well, but instead of boring numbers you have to deal of light and darkness, good and evil, angels and demons. Choose you side and decide the fate of the world!

HOW TO PLAY:

Swipe (Up, Down, Left, Right) to move the tiles. When two tiles with the same being are in contact, into a new one, stronger and much more powerful, much more strong and powerful.

To access Leaderboard & Achievements, you will have to sign in using google plus account. Make sure you have Google+ installed and enabled on your phone or tablet.

FEATURES:

  • Awesome pixel-art style
  • Atmospheric music
  • Dark and light sides of forces
  • Automatic saving
  • High score
  • Leaderboard
  • Achievements
